{/* Course Cover */}

💻 Full Stack Development

Become a **Full Stack Developer** and master frontend + backend skills. Build modern web apps with **React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB**. Perfect for beginners who want to go from **zero → job-ready**.

₹60,000 ₹29,999 🔥 50% OFF
{/* Course Info */}

📘 Course Overview

  • 🕒 Duration: 6 Months
  • 📚 Level: Beginner → Advanced
  • 🌐 Language: English
  • 🎓 Certification: Yes
  • 👨‍🏫 Mentorship: Included
{/* What You Will Learn */}

🚀 What You Will Learn

  • Frontend Development → HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React
  • Backend Development → Node.js, Express.js
  • Database Management → MongoDB
  • Authentication & Security
  • Deployment on Cloud Platforms
  • Building 3+ Real-World Projects
